params.tokenId: The token ID of the Edition.
The token ID to get the fee strategy for.

returns._0: The fee strategy for the token ID.

params.tokenId: The token ID to get the max supply for.

returns._0: The max supply for the token ID.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to mint.
params.data: Additional data to pass to the receiver.
params.to: The address to mint the token to.

params.tokenId: The token ID of the work.

params.closesAt: The timestamp after which the work is no longer mintable.
params.creator: The creator of the work.
params.maxSupply: The maximum supply of the work.
params.opensAt: The timestamp after which the work is mintable.
params.strategy: The fee strategy for the work.

returns._0: The token ID of the work.

params.interfaceId: The interface ID to check for support.

returns._0: True if the contract supports the interface, false otherwise.

params.tokenId: The token ID to get the total supply for.

returns._0: The total supply for the token ID.

params.tokenId: The token ID to get the URI for.

returns._0: The URI for the token ID.

creator().notice: Get the creator of the Edition. Alias for {owner}.

creator(uint256).notice: Get the creator of the given work (token ID).

feeStrategy(uint256).notice: Get the fee strategy for the given token ID.

maxSupply(uint256).notice: Get the max supply for the given token ID.

mint(address,uint256,uint256,address,byt.notice: Mints `amount` of the given `tokenId` to the `to` address.

name().notice: Get the name of the Edition.

node(uint256).notice: Get the {Node} for the given work.

owner().notice: Get the owner of the Edition.

publish(address,uint256,uint64,uint64,(u.notice: Publishes a new work within the edition on behalf of `creator` with the given configuration.

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Determine if the contract supports the given interface.

totalSupply(uint256).notice: Get the total supply for the given token ID.

uri(uint256).notice: Get the URI for the given token ID
